name: tm16
effect: Teaches Light Screen to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Light Screen to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Icy Wind Gen I: Pay Day)

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Creates a wall of light that lowers SP. ATK damage.
flavor_text.emerald: Creates a wall of light that lowers SP. ATK damage.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A wall of light cuts damage from SP. ATK attacks for five turns.
